title: 3D Motion Capture System Market by System, Application, Hardware, Software, Services, and Geography - Global Forecast to 2020 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 4:05 PM   ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- 3D motion capture systems are a combination of multiple devices mainly high-quality cameras, sensors, communication devices, and accessories. The systems are used to record the real-time motion of object or individual to obtain the desired level of animation in the field of entertainment such as films and games. The 3D motion capture systems can also be used across the life science sector, mainly in medical and sports for applications such as running analysis, swimming, baseball, rehabilitation, gait analysis, and many more. This report segments the said market based on systems, hardware, software, services, applications, and geographies. The report also includes the analysis and forecasts related to the 3D motion capture systems market.The 3D motion capture systems market has been classified into optical and non-optical based on the system type. The said market has been segmented on the basis of hardware into cameras, sensors, communication devices, and accessories; based on software into packaged and plug-in; based on services into training & development, installation, consulting, and others; and based on application into entertainment, life science, and others.The 3D motion capture systems market is expected to reach USD 142.5 million by 2020, at a CAGR of 10.12% from 2015 to 2020. The optical systems market is expected to have the largest market size till 2020,while the market for non-optical systems is expected to grow at the highest CAGR; its growth can be attributed to its increasing usage in the applications such as films, games, medical, sports, robotics, education, and engineering segment.The said market has been segmented based on geographic regions into North America, Europe, APAC, and RoW. The APAC region is currently the fastest-growing market for 3D motion capture systems and is expected to exhibit a high growth rate in the next five years.The report also details the competitive landscape of the 3D motion capture systems market by analyzing the strategies adopted by major players to achieve growth in the market. Apart from the market segmentation data, the report also includes qualitative analysis of various market dynamics such as the drivers, restraints, challenges, and opportunities. It also analyzes the overall market through various models such as the Porter's five forces framework. The report includes the profiles of the major players in the 3D motion capture systems market, along with their respective market ranking analyses.Some of the prominent companies in this market include Vicon Motion Systems Ltd. (U.K.), Motion Analysis Corporation (U.S.), Xsens Technologies B.V. (Netherland), Qualisys AB (Sweden), Northern Digital, Inc. (Canada), Phoenix Technologies, Inc. (Canada), OptiTrack (U.S.), Synertial (U.K.), Codamotion (U.K.), PhaseSpace, Inc. (U.S.), and Noraxon U.S.A. Inc. (U.S.).
